subject: Baseball
Families and Family Life
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Times are tense for Linda Goldman, fervent Red Sox fan and Boston-area resident, and her sister Bonnie Bernstein, fervent Indians fan and Cleveland-area resident.
